duties_responsibilities.duty: Build, estimate, and schedule mechanical, electrical, and heavy industrial construction.

Support administrative and construction activities as assigned, including reviewing proposals, specifications, and drawings; performing material takeoffs; preparing cost estimates; and attending pre-bid investigation meetings.

Learn to supervise subcontractors, communicate with vendors, prepare work plans, assure quality control, manage and track costs and materials, Schedule equipment, administer safety programs, and maintain exceptional owner relations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Electrical, Mechanical, or Civil Engineering
